about_the_game:
Tower Defense game - Build units to destroy incoming waves of enemies or....not succeed trying :)

Basic info:
Incoming enemies can and will attack your units occasionally as well, have no worries as you will be equipped with multiple ways to protect, regenerate or shield your units.
Game begins slowly with only few towers to pick from and as you progress you will get basic many upgrades, different choice of towers, tower specializations (from level 10, example archer has - burning, ice or poison arrows), offensive tower upgrades(increased range, damage to specific type...)

Abilities:
You get to use special abilities on your enemies, like meteors, ice rocks, cataclysm, curses, poison and more.
Each unit build lowers cooldown of specific ability. - currently disabled in multiplayer for client

Multiplayer : (PLEASE READ if you are planning on playing multiplayer)
There is lobby currently and it is in test mode, game works, difficulty is scalable on number of players all is "supposedly" working but it needs more testing.
There is No local support for multiplayer(2 or more players playing on 1 PC, like split screen)
Lan has been disabled currently

Levels and difficulty:
Currently 32 levels are active. (Enemy waves are usually between 15 and 25 per level, there are few exceptions) 10 - 20 mins per level
5 regular difficulties + 1 challenge (dynamic)
Playing on higher difficult will get you to earn more points.
Global score system
5 Different Types of units(Single Target, Multi target, AOE, multi purpose and utility)
40+ different units can be built. Some are variations and some are more specialized for certain fights.
Each tower can be upgraded 5 times.

Game maps and optimization:
There are 2 maps default(HighQ) and LowQ( you can choose in options -> graphic), you would need to start again from main menu if you decide to change (enemy wave levels are identical)
HighQ is default one and is preferable to play.
LowQ is very basic and has box shapes, circles instead of landscape with regular lightning( indented for laptops with integrated graphic cards )

Skills:
Currently 60 skill points, you gain a point per level completed.

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 ghz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
